channel.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
channel.description: How do I add donor points to my PI base? Like how do I make it so it's in char files (I know you add it to playersave.java but I keep getting errors) and how do I make items have the price for them? (Example: Santa = 5 Points.) I already have shop that has the point method... I'll rep++ :D

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:15, topic:363742”][quote author=EmulousGuru link=topic=459988.msg3365338#msg3365338 date=1286733618]
Here is the token:

if (token.equals("character-donorPoints")) {
	p.donorPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);
}

^That goes in case 2 of the switch(ReadMode) statement, inside the loadGame boolean^

Here is the writing method:

characterfile.write("character-donorPoints = ", 0, 24);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donorPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.donorPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

^That goes under the “[CHARACTER]” token-writing section, of the saveGame boolean^

Here is the shop method:

if(c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
	if (c.donorPoints >= TotPrice2) {
		if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
			c.donorPoints -= TotPrice2;
			c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
				Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
			break;
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Donator Points.");
		break;
	}
}

^Remember to change the SHOP_ID constant, and declare ‘donorPoints’ in Player.java^
[/quote]

I know its an old topic, but this is exactly what i was looking for!!!

but need to know where to put all these codes…

pls some1[/quote]
Gravedig moar?
Anyway.
Just google a tut.
I got it on my old server but I shut that down forever ago :P.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]

item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:3, topic:363742”]Here is the token:

if (token.equals("character-donorPoints")) {

}

^That goes in case 2 of the switch(ReadMode) statement, inside the loadGame boolean^

Here is the writing method:

characterfile.write("character-donorPoints = ", 0, 24);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donorPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.donorPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

^That goes under the “[CHARACTER]” token-writing section, of the saveGame boolean^

Here is the shop method:

if(c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
	if (c.donorPoints >= TotPrice2) {
		if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
			c.donorPoints -= TotPrice2;
			c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
				Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
			break;
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Donator Points.");
		break;
	}
}

^Remember to change the SHOP_ID constant, and declare ‘donorPoints’ in Player.java^[/quote]

I know its an old topic, but this is exactly what i was looking for!!!

but need to know where to put all these codes…

pls some1

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:7, topic:363742”]Try this:

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case ITEM_ID: return ITEM_PRICE; break; } } [/quote]
Where do I put that?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Try this:

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
	switch (id) {
	        case ITEM_ID:
	                return ITEM_PRICE;
	        break;
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:3, topic:363742”]Here is the token:

if (token.equals("character-donorPoints")) {
	p.donorPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);
}

^That goes in case 2 of the switch(ReadMode) statement, inside the loadGame boolean^

Here is the writing method:

characterfile.write("character-donorPoints = ", 0, 24);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donorPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.donorPoints).length());
characterfile.newLine();

^That goes under the “[CHARACTER]” token-writing section, of the saveGame boolean^

Here is the shop method:

if(c.myShopId == SHOP_ID) {
	if (c.donorPoints >= TotPrice2) {
		if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
			c.donorPoints -= TotPrice2;
			c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
			Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
				Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
			break;
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Donator Points.");
		break;
	}
}

^Remember to change the SHOP_ID constant, and declare ‘donorPoints’ in Player.java^[/quote]
Tyvm. It worked. But how do I make the items worth donor point values?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How to Add Donor Points?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

you edit it in item.cfg
example
item = 995 Coins Lovely_money! 1 1 1
the first 3 numbers are 1 1 1
the 1st 1 is sell value
the 2nd 1 is buy value
the 3rd 1 is alch value
